TemporalDirections.TEXT: 289,JERRY,"How do you like that? (tries to turn away again; thinking)Can I turn now? Is this over? No, I cant, I cant. Im stuck.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 290,ELAINE,(noticing Jerry not wanting to listen; annoyed) Jerry? Are you listening to me?,1.0,S01E01,1.0 291,JERRY,"Yes, I heard you.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 292,PAMELA,"Elaine, whats the name of that jewelry store you took me to that time?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 293,JERRY,"(thinking) Thank you, Pamela! (turns to talk to Vanessa; to Vanessa) So, youre a lawyer...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 294,VANESSA,"Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 295,JERRY,"(thinking) Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft. Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft... (to Vanessa) Of course, they handled my tattoo removal lawsuit.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 296,VANESSA,"Oh, that was you?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 297,JERRY,"Imagine, spelling Mom with two Os.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 298,VANESSA,Very funny! What do you do?,1.0,S01E01,1.0

DIRECTION.text: noticing Jerry not wanting to listen

DIALOGUE.text: Can I turn now? Is this over?
Jerry? Are you listening to me?
Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft. Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft...
Of course, they handled my tattoo removal lawsuit.
